name: AVMediaSelectionGroup
desc: An object that represents a collection of mutually exclusive options for the presentation of media within an asset.

items.name: var options: [AVMediaSelectionOption]
items.desc: A collection of mutually exclusive media selection options

items.name: func mediaSelectionOption(withPropertyList: Any) -> AVMediaSelectionOption?
items.desc: Returns the media selection options that match the given property list.

items.name: var defaultOption: AVMediaSelectionOption?
items.desc: The default option in the group.

items.name: var allowsEmptySelection: Bool

items.name: class func playableMediaSelectionOptions(from: [AVMediaSelectionOption]) -> [AVMediaSelectionOption]
items.desc: Returns an array containing the media selection options from a given array that are playable.

items.name: class func mediaSelectionOptions(from: [AVMediaSelectionOption], with: Locale) -> [AVMediaSelectionOption]
